critical_analysis.relevance: This page from 'Simulacra Magic - Exercises' is highly relevant for understanding a structured approach to practical magic within the context of the Esoteric School of Shamanism and Magic. The emphasis on daily rituals and specific 'simulacra procedures' suggests a system that integrates ongoing magical discipline with focused operational work. The concept of 'simulacra' points towards advanced magical theory concerning the creation and manipulation of subjective realities, thought-forms, or artificial intelligences (egregores/servitors), which are central to modern magical traditions like Chaos Magic, but also have roots in Hermeticism and Qabalah's discussions of created forms. This systematic, exercise-driven format facilitates a methodical progression in magical training.
